Text:
Thank you very much, I was looking for this in years! And with Portuguese subtitles!

Could it be possible to upload the special edition of The Bridge on the River Kwai? There´s not a complete seed available.

Also, being a fan of the quality of your work, may I make some personal suggestions?

High Sierra (1941, Raoul Walsh)
Mrs. Miniver (1942, William Wyler)
The Search (1946, Fred Zinnemann)
Red River (1949, John Ford)
The Window (1949, Ted Tetzlaff)
The Prisoner (1955, Peter Glenville) 
Gigi (1958, Vincente Minnelli)
Father of a Soldier (1958, Rezo Chkheidze)
Charade (1963, Stanley Donen)
Taps (1981, Harold Becker)
The Insider (1999, Michael Mann)
Kingdom of Heaven (2005, Ridley Scott) (4 disc director´s cut)

@ LouisAnderson: I've already ul The Bridge On The River Kwai. That's the only edition I have. If you dl I'll make sure to seed,

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7089167/The_Bridge_on_the_River_Kwai_[1957]_Eng__Fr__Ger___multisub__DVD

About your other requests, at the moment I don't have any of them. But I'm allways looking so maybe they will come in the future. Thansks for your comment.
